title: Discover River and Themes (Experimental) (1.8)
subheader: Finally after so many days without using todoist
description: I finally working on a new feature called `Discover` that will fetch any user from database and will appear featured user, tending post and themes. Also I'm trying to make themes for this plataform with these tending themes

title: Visual Refresh for River (1.7)
subheader: Light mode more like me throwing a flashbang into your dark room
description: I update the UI color to use light only (yet again). Here many feature coming soon.

title: New update for PostID (1.6)
description: I finally added new feature called post id that only appear as one post. (Also comment is WIP)

title: I forgor (1.5.6.1)
description: I forgot that the new JWT keys is working on production

title: JWT Issue (1.5.6)
subheader: How the hell did the JWT key expired?
description: I having issue at JWT key being expired right now, I'm trying to figure it out how to fix.

title: CreatePost.tsx enabled and uuids working (1.5.3)
subheader: Thanks Numeral for literally helping (a bit) at signup page
description: I fixed the critical bug, and some changes at some components

title: CreatePost.tsx disabled (1.5.2)
subheader: Database need help, also someone need devs
description: I'm working on a fix that fixes critical bug that still able to post in `NULL` on their `username` and `user_id`

title: Changes for currect dark theme and Bug Fixes (Version 1.5.1)
subheader: A bit for rounding some components.
description: Fixed some issue at `CreatePost.tsx` that casued to Guest allowing to post without signing up. But posting will cause issue as Guest. Also I fixed some css issue and rounded some components.

title: New dark mode at River and more (Version 1.5)
description: Hi everyone! I've made a new organization that we makes free open-source apps. It called **Blomware**, yep, this is new. Also I've resdesigned the theme to look better in dark mode (Which is the defualt for now).

title: Adding some markdown support for River and more Feature (Version 1.3-1.4)
description: Since the *first* release for **River React** I did forget about markdown can be put into data. Also I did add some markdown feature and some post works very well whitin the markdown support. I've added `Profile` and `About` page

title: Frist Post ever done using .json
description: Hi everyone! I've setup the blog properly and *I'm going to post in any day*
